EmailTemplate.subject: MyCase Payments Customer Experience Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyCase Payments Customer Experience Survey
Hello!
Would you please take a moment to answer our brief one minute survey?
Your feedback helps us continue to improve your experience with MyCase.
https://survey.alchemer.com/s3/6320388/MyCase-Payments-Case-Experience-Survey?c={!Case.ContactId}&a={!Case.AccountId}&ca={!Case.Id}&e={!Case.OwnerId}
Thank you for your time and thoughts, we appreciate your feedback!
Lance Klopp Sr. Manager, Payments MyCase www.mycase.com
